effect_summary: Creates a copy of 1 of your Jokers at random, then destroys the others, leaving you with two identical Jokers. ( Editions are also copied, except Negative)
Add Foil , Holographic , or Polychrome edition (determined at random) to 1 selected card in hand.
Upgrades every poker hand (including secret hands not yet discovered) by one level.
Creates 2 exact copies (including Enhancements, Editions and Seals ) of a selected card in your hand.
Adds a Red Seal to 1 selected card.

Add Negative to a random Joker , but -1 Hand Size , plus another -1 hand size for each time Ectoplasm has been used this run, e.g. using Ectoplasm 3 times in the same run decreases hand size by a total of 6 (1+2+3)
Destroy 1 random card in your hand, but add 3 random Enhanced face cards instead.
synergies_or_notes: Cannot be used when hand size is 1

effect_summary: Destroy 1 random card in your hand, but add 2 random Enhanced Aces instead.
synergies_or_notes: Cannot be used when hand size is 1

effect_summary: Adds Polychrome to a random Joker , and destroys the rest.
Destroys 5 random cards in hand, but gain $20 .
synergies_or_notes: Cannot be used when hand size is 1

effect_summary: Destroy 1 random card in your hand, but add 4 random Enhanced numbered cards instead.
synergies_or_notes: Cannot be used when hand size is 1

effect_summary: Adds a Purple Seal to 1 selected card.
Converts all cards in hand to a single random rank , but -1 Hand Size .
synergies_or_notes: Cannot be used when hand size is 1

effect_summary: Converts all cards in hand to a single random suit .
synergies_or_notes: Cannot be used when hand size is 1

effect_summary: Add a Gold Seal to 1 selected card.
Creates a Legendary Joker. (Must have room) Artwork: This card is animated, with the gem beating like a heart, or perhaps something inside is trying to break out...
Adds a Blue Seal to 1 selected card.
Creates a random Rare Joker (must have room), but sets money to $0 .
